Name: WalkBot
About the game: WalkBot is a quirky story-driven puzzle game set in a stupid future told over three acts. In WalkBot you play as a new version prototype of the product line 'WalkBot'. WalkBots don't have any abilities of their own, except for walking. Luckily though, your head comes with the ability to switch bodies. Launch your head and reconnect to gain different capabilities! It's a short game - expect 1-1.5 hours to complete. Hope you like it!
